data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Arecibo to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Arecibo, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Arecibo that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Arecibo, Puerto Rico know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 26,661 believers in the state of Arecibo.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of La Alianza
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of La Alianza, Arecibo, Puerto Rico.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Arecibo.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Arecibo, Puerto Rico. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Arecibo, Puerto Rico has a population of 82,000.

We estimate Arecibo has 26,661 people who might know Jesus, 50,868 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 4,471 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Arecibo, Puerto Rico.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight
